de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Interface ImvConnectionAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImConnectionAdapter, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImvConnectionAdapterIetf, ImvConnectionAdapterIetfLong

    public interface ImvConnectionAdapter
extends ImConnectionAdapter, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
    Generic IMV connection adapter adapting and controlling an IMV connection.
